GK19bahcar5_au:1: niyatir vidhāya puṃsāṃ prathamaṃ sukham upari dāruṇaṃ duḥkham /
GK19bahcar5_au:2: kṛtvā lokaṃ taralā taḍid iva vajraṃ nipātayati // BaHcar_5.1 //
GK19bahcar5_au:3: pātayati mahā-puruṣān samam eva bahūn an-ādareṇâiva /
GK19bahcar5_au:4: parivartamāna ekaḥ kālaḥ śailān ivân-antaḥ // BaHcar_5.2 //
GK19bahcar5_au:5: atha kadā-cid rājā Rājya-vardhanaṃ kavaca-haram āhūya Hūṇān hantuṃ hariṇān iva harir hariṇêśa-kiśoram a-parimita-balânuyātaṃ ciraṃ-tanair amātyair anuraktaiś ca mahā-sāmantaiḥ kṛtvā sâbhisaram uttarā-pathaṃ prāhiṇot.
GK19bahcar5_au:6: prayāntaṃ ca taṃ devo Harṣaḥ kati-cit prayāṇakāni turaṅgamair anuvavrāja.
GK19bahcar5_au:7: praviṣṭe ca Kailāsa-prabhā-bhāsinīṃ kakubhaṃ bhrātari vartamāno nave vayasi vikrama-rasânurodhini
GK19bahcar5_au:9: krīḍan mṛgayāṃ mṛga-locanaḥ katipayāny ahāni bahir eva vyalambata.
GK19bahcar5_au:11: ekadā tu vāsateyyās turīye yāme pratyuṣasyêva svapne
GK19bahcar5_au:14: tasminn eva ca dāva-dahane samutsṛjya śāvakān utplutya câtmānaṃ pātayantīṃ siṃhīm apaśyat.
GK19bahcar5_au:15: āsīc câsya cetasi loke hi lohebhyaḥ kaṭhinatarāḥ khalu sneha-mayā
GK19bahcar5_au:16: bandhana-pāśā yad ākṛṣṭās tiryañco 'py evam ācāranti iti.
GK19bahcar5_au:17: prabuddhasya câsya muhur-muhur dakṣiṇêtaram akṣi paspande.
GK19bahcar5_au:25: ahni ca tasmiñ śūnyenaiva ca cetasā cikrīḍa mṛgayām.
GK19bahcar5_au:26: ārohati ca harita-haye madhyam ahno bhavanam āgatyôbhayato manda-mandaṃ
GK19bahcar5_au:30: atha dūrād eva lekha-garbhayā nīlī-rāga-mecaka-rucā cīra-cīrikayā
GK19bahcar5_au:35: atitvarayā kṛta-pakṣam ivâśu parāpatantaṃ preryamāṇam iva pṛṣṭhataḥ svāmy-ādeśenâkṛṣyamāṇam iva purastād āyataiḥ śrama-śvāsa-mokṣaiḥ
GK19bahcar5_au:39: śūnya-hṛdayatayā skhalantaṃ kāla-megha-śakalam iva patiṣyato dur-vārtā-vajrasya dhūma-pallavam iva jvaliṣyataḥ śoka-jvalanasya bījam iva phaliṣyato duṣ-kṛta-śāler a-nimitta-bhūta-dīrghâdhvagaṃ
GK19bahcar5_au:42: Kuraṅgakas tu kṛta-praṇāmaḥ samupasṛtya prathamam ānana-lagnaṃ viṣādam upaninye paścāl lekham.
GK19bahcar5_au:43: taṃ ca devo Harṣaḥ svayam evâdāyâvācayat.
GK19bahcar5_au:44: lekhârthenaiva ca samaṃ gṛhītvā hṛdayena saṃtāpam avagraha-rūpo 'bhyadhāt.
GK19bahcar5_au:46: sa cakṣuṣā bāṣpa-jala-bindubhir mukhena ca khañjâkṣaraiḥ kṣaradbhir yugapad ācacakṣe deva dāha-jvaro mahān iti.
GK19bahcar5_au:47: tac câkarṇya sahasā sahasradhêvâsya hṛdayaṃ paphāla.
GK19bahcar5_au:51: dāpaya vājinaḥ paryāṇam iti ca puraḥ-sthitaṃ śiraḥ-kṛpāṇaṃ bibhrāṇaṃ babhāṇa yuvānam.
GK19bahcar5_au:52: vepamāna-hṛdayaś ca sa-saṃbhrama-pradhāvita-parivardhakôpanītam āruhya turaṅgam ekāky eva
GK19bahcar5_au:54: udbhūta-mukhara-khura-rava-bharita-sakala-bhuvana-vivaram āgatyâgatya sarvābhyo digbhyo dhāvamānam aśvo 'yam aḍhaukata.
GK19bahcar5_au:55: prasthitasya câsya pradakṣiṇêtaraṃ prayānto vināśam upasthitaṃ
GK19bahcar5_au:57: a-śiśira-raśmi-maṇḍalâbhimukhaś ca hṛdayam avadārayann iva dāva-śuṣke
GK19bahcar5_au:62: hṛdayena pitṛ-snehâhita-mradimnā ca tat tad upekṣamāṇas
GK19bahcar5_au:63: turaṅgama-skandha-baddha-lakṣyaṃ cakṣur a-vicalaṃ dadhāno duḥkham avasita-hasita-saṃkathas tūṣṇīṃ-bhūtena bhūpāla-lokenânugamyamāno
GK19bahcar5_au:66: bhagavati bhānumati bhaṇḍi-pramukhena praṇayinā rāja-putra-lokena bahuśo vijñāpyamāno 'pi nâhāram akarot.
GK19bahcar5_au:82: prakāśa-nara-pati-kumāraka-kriyamāṇa-mahā-māṃsa-vikraya-prakramam upahatam iva śmaśāna-pāṃśubhir a-maṅgalair iva parigṛhītaṃ yātu-dhānair iva vidhvastaṃ kali-kālenêva kavalitaṃ pāpa-paṭalair iva saṃchāditam a-dharma-vikṣepair iva luṇṭhitam a-nityatâdhikārair ivâkrāntaṃ
GK19bahcar5_au:83: niyati-vilāsair ivâtmī-kṛtaṃ śūnyam iva suptam iva muṣitam iva vilakṣitam iva chalitam iva mūrcchitam iva skandhâvāraṃ samāsasāda.
GK19bahcar5_au:86: bhīṣaṇa-mahiṣâdhirūḍha-preta-nātha-sanāthe citravati paṭe para-loka-vyatikaram itara-kara-kalitena śarakāṇḍena kathayantaṃ yama-paṭṭikaṃ dadarśa.
GK19bahcar5_au:89: yuge yuge vyatītāni kasya te kasya vā bhavān // BaHcar_5.3 //
GK19bahcar5_au:96: Suṣeṇa asti tātasya viśeṣo na vā iti.
GK19bahcar5_au:97: so 'bravīt: nâstîdānīṃ yadi bhavet kumāraṃ dṛṣṭvā iti.
GK19bahcar5_au:98: mandaṃ mandaṃ dvāra-pālaiḥ praṇamyamānaś ca dīyamāna-sarvasvaṃ
GK19bahcar5_au:113: kena-cit paśāca-vārtāṃ vivṛṇvatā kena-cit kārtāntikâdeśān prakāśayatā kena-cid upaliṅgāni gāyatā anyenânityatāṃ bhāvayatā saṃsāraṃ câpavadatā
GK19bahcar5_au:114: kali-kāla-vilasitāni ca nindatā daivaṃ côpālabhamānenâpareṇa dharmāya kupyatā rāja-kula-devatāś câdhikṣipatā apareṇa kliṣṭa-kula-putraka-bhāgyāni garhayatā bāhya-parijanena
GK19bahcar5_au:118: tailānāṃ ca prapacyamānānāṃ gandham ājighrann avāpa tṛtīyaṃ kakṣyântaram.
GK19bahcar5_au:154: para-loka-vijayāya nīrājyamāṇam iva jvara-jvalanenânavarata-parivartanais-taraṅgiṇi śayanīye śeṣam iva
GK19bahcar5_au:156: jaladhim iva kṣaya-kāle śuṣyantaṃ kālena Kailāsam iva
GK19bahcar5_au:166: lalāṭa-phalakena bhayam upajanayantam āsanna-yama-darśanôdvegād iva ca kiṃ-cid-antaḥ-praviṣṭa-tārakaṃ cakṣur dadhānaṃ śuṣyad-daśana-paṅkti-prasṛta-dhūsara-dīdhiti-taraṅgiṇīṃ mṛga-tṛṣṇikām
GK19bahcar5_au:173: saṃtāpâtiśayam iva kathayantaṃ spṛṣantīṃ praṇayinīm iva viśvāsa-bhūmiṃ
GK19bahcar5_au:174: mūrcchām api bahu manyamānam antakâhvānâkṣarair iva
GK19bahcar5_au:177: īrṣyayêva chāyayā vimucyamānam udyogam ivôpadravāṇaṃ sarvâstra-mokṣam iva kṣāmatāyā hastī-kṛtaṃ vihastatayā viṣayī-kṛtaṃ vaiṣamyeṇa kṣetrī-kṛtaṃ
GK19bahcar5_au:178: kṣayeṇa gocarī-kṛtaṃ glānyā daṣṭaṃ duḥkhâsikayā ātmī-kṛtam a-svāsthyena
GK19bahcar5_au:179: vidheyī-kṛtaṃ vyādhinā kroḍī-kṛtaṃ kālena lakṣyī-kṛtaṃ dakṣiṇâśayā pītam iva pīḍābhir jagdham iva jāgareṇa nigīrṇam iva vaivarṇyena grāsī-kṛtam iva
GK19bahcar5_au:180: gātra-bhaṅgena hriyamāṇam iva vipadbhir vaṇṭyamānam iva vedanābhir
GK19bahcar5_au:181: luṇṭhyamānam iva duḥkhair āditsitaṃ daivena nirūpitaṃ niyatyā samāghrātam a-nityatvena abhibhūyamānam a-bhāvena parikalitaṃ parāsutayā dattâvakāśaṃ
GK19bahcar5_au:182: kleśasya nivāsaṃ vaimanasyasya samīpe kālasya antike 'ntyôcchvāsasya mukhe
GK19bahcar5_au:183: mahā-pravāsasya dvāri dīrgha-nidrāyāḥ jihvâgre jīvitêśasya vartamānaṃ
GK19bahcar5_au:184: viralaṃ vāci calitaṃ cetasi vihvalaṃ vapuṣi kṣīṇam āyuṣi pracuraṃ pralāpe saṃtataṃ śvasite jitaṃ jṛmbhikābhiḥ parādhīnam ādhibhir anubaddham anubandhikābhiḥ pārśvâpaviṣṭayā cânavarata-rodanôcchūna-nayanayā
GK19bahcar5_au:186: vividhauṣadhi-dhūli-dhūsarita-śarīrayā muhur muhur ārya-putra svapiṣi iti vyāharantyā devyā Yaśomatyā śirasi vakṣasi ca spṛśyamānaṃ pitaram adrākṣīt.
GK19bahcar5_au:187: dṛṣṭvā ca prathama-duḥkha-saṃpāta-mathyamāna-matir āśaṅkita iva bhāga-dheyebhyaḥ samabhavat.
GK19bahcar5_au:190: avadhūtaś ca dhairyeṇa kṣetrī-kṛtaḥ kṣobheṇa riktī-kṛto ratyā viṣayī-kṛto
GK19bahcar5_au:191: viṣādena pāvaka-mayam iva hṛdayam udvahan viṣama-vidūṣitānîva
GK19bahcar5_au:192: muhyantîndriyāṇi bibhrāṇas tamasā rasā-talam api viśeṣayan śūnyatvenâkāśam
GK19bahcar5_au:194: pasparśa ca hṛdayena bhiyam uttamâṅgena ca gām.
GK19bahcar5_au:195: avani-patis tu dūrād eva dṛṣṭvâtidayitaṃ tanayaṃ tad-avastho 'pi
GK19bahcar5_au:196: nirbhara-snehâvarjitaḥ pradhāvamāno manasā prasārya bhujau ehy ehi ity āhvayan śarīrârdhena śayanād udagāt.
GK19bahcar5_au:197: sa-saṃbhramam upasṛtaṃ cainaṃ vinayâvanamram unnamayya balād urasi niveśya viśann iva premṇā niśā-kara-maṇḍala-madhyaṃ majjann ivâmṛta-maye
GK19bahcar5_au:199: 'bhiṣicyamāna iva tuṣārâdri-draveṇa pīḍayann aṅgair aṅgāni kapolena kapolam avaghaṭṭayan nimīlayan
GK19bahcar5_au:201: kathaṃ katham-api cirād vimuktam apasṛtya kṛta-namaskāraṃ
GK19bahcar5_au:202: praṇata-jananīkam upāgatam āsīnaṃ ca śayanântike pibann iva
GK19bahcar5_au:204: pasparśa ca punaḥ punar vepathumatā pāṇi-talena kṣaya-kṣāma-kaṇṭhaś ca kṛcchrād ivâvadīt: vatsa kṛśo 'si iti.
GK19bahcar5_au:205: bhaṇḍis tv akathayat: deva tṛtīyam ahaḥ kṛtâhārasyâsyâdya iti.
GK19bahcar5_au:206: tac chrutvā bāṣpa-vega-gṛhyamāṇâkṣaraṃ kathaṃ katham apy āyataṃ
GK19bahcar5_au:207: niḥśvasyôvāca vatsa jānāmi tvāṃ pitṛ-priyam ati-mṛdu-hṛdayam.
GK19bahcar5_au:213: niśitam iva śastraṃ takṣṇoti māṃ tvadīyas tanimā.
GK19bahcar5_au:214: sukhaṃ ca rājyaṃ ca vaṃśaś ca prāṇāś ca paralokaś ca tvayi me sthitāḥ.
GK19bahcar5_au:216: tvad-vidhānāṃ pīḍāḥ pīḍayanti sakalam eva bhuvana-talam.
GK19bahcar5_au:217: na ny alpa-puṇya-bhājāṃ vaṃśam alaṃ-kurvanti bhavādṛśāḥ phalam asyâneka-janmântarôpārjitasyâkaluṣasya
GK19bahcar5_au:218: kara-tala-gatam iva kathayanti caturṇām apy arṇavānām ādhipatyaṃ te
GK19bahcar5_au:225: prajābhis tu bandhumanto rājāno na jñātibhiḥ.
GK19bahcar5_au:228: kṛtâhāre ca tvayy aham api svayam upayokṣye pathyam ity evam abhihitasya câsya dhakṣyann iva hṛdayam atitarāṃ śokânalaḥ saṃdudhukṣe.
GK19bahcar5_au:229: kṣaṇa-mātraṃ ca sthitvā pitrā punar āhārârtham ādiśyamāno dhavala-gṛhād
GK19bahcar5_au:231: cakāra ca cetasi akāṇḍe khalv ayaṃ samupasthito mahā-pralayo vyabhra iva vajra-pātaḥ.
GK19bahcar5_au:232: sāmānyo 'pi tāvac chokaḥ sôcchvāsaṃ maraṇam anupadiṣṭauṣadho mahā-vyādhir
GK19bahcar5_au:238: rāja-puruṣeṇâdhiṣṭhitaś ca gatvā sva-dhāma dhūma-mayān iva kṛtâśru-pātān
GK19bahcar5_au:239: agni-mayān iva janita-hṛdaya-dāhān viṣa-mayān iva datta-mūrcchā-vegān.
GK19bahcar5_au:244: gatvā ca pratinivṛttya ca deva tathaiva iti vijñāpitas tenâgṛhīta-tāmbūla
GK19bahcar5_au:245: evôttāmyatā manasâstâbhilāṣiṇi savitari sarvān āhūyôpahvare vaidyān kim asminn evaṃvidhe vidheyam adhunā iti viṣaṇṇa-hṛdayaḥ papraccha.
GK19bahcar5_au:246: te tu vyajñāpayan deva dhairyam avalambasva.
GK19bahcar5_au:247: katipayair eva vāsaraiḥ punaḥ svāṃ prakṛtim āpannaṃ svasthaṃ śroṣyasi pitaram iti.
GK19bahcar5_au:248: teṣāṃ tu bhiṣajāṃ madhye paunarvasavo yuvâṣṭādaśa-varṣa-deśīyas tasminn eva rāja-kule kula-kramâgato gataḥ paramparām aṣṭâṅgasyâyur-vedasya
GK19bahcar5_au:250: yathāvad-vijñātā vyādhi-svarūpāṇāṃ Rasāyano nāma vaidya-kumārakaḥ sâsras tuṣṇīm adho-mukho
GK19bahcar5_au:251: pṛṣṭaś ca rāja-sūnunā sakhe Rasāyana kathaya tathyaṃ yad a-sādhv iva paśyasi iti.
GK19bahcar5_au:252: so 'bravīt: deva śvaḥ prabhāte yathâvasthitam āvedayitâsmi iti.
GK19bahcar5_au:253: atraiva cântare bhavana-kamalinī-pālaḥ kokam āśvāsayann apara-vaktram
GK19bahcar5_au:255: vihaga kuru dṛḍhaṃ manaḥ svayaṃ tyaja śucam āssva viveka-vartmani /
GK19bahcar5_au:257: tac câkarṇya vāṇ-nimitta-jñaḥ pitari sutarāṃ jīvitâśāṃ śithilī-cakāra.
GK19bahcar5_au:258: gateṣu ca bhiṣakṣu kṣata-dhṛtiḥ kṣapâmukhe kṣiti-pāla-samīpam eva punar āruroha.
GK19bahcar5_au:268: mandaya dāham Indumati aravindair janaya jalârdrayā mudaṃ Madirāvati samupanaya mṛṇālāni Mālati taralaya tāla-vṛntam Āvantike mūrdhānaṃ dhāvamānaṃ badhāna Bandhumati kandharāṃ dhāraya Dhāraṇike urasi sa-śīkaraṃ
GK19bahcar5_au:269: karaṃ kuru Kuraṅgavati saṃvāhaya bāhū Balāhike pīḍaya pādau Padmāvati gṛhāṇa gāḍham aṅgam Anaṅgasene kā velā vartate Vilāsavati naiti nidrā kathā kathaya Kumudvati ity evaṃ prāyān pitur ālāpān anavaratam ākarṇayan dūyamāna-hṛdayo duḥkha-dīrghāṃ jāgrad eva niśām anaiṣīt.
GK19bahcar5_au:272: tatra ca tvaramāṇo bhrātur āgamanârtham upary upari kṣipra-pātino
GK19bahcar5_au:274: prakṣālita-vadanaś ca parijanenôpanitam api prati-karma nâgrahīt.
GK19bahcar5_au:275: agrataḥ sthitānāṃ rāja-putra-yūnāṃ vi-manasāṃ Rasâyano Rasâyana iti
GK19bahcar5_au:277: paryapṛcchac ca tān bhadrāḥ kiṃ Rasâyana iti.
GK19bahcar5_au:278: pṛṣṭāś ca te sarve samam eva tūṣṇīṃ-babhūvuḥ.
GK19bahcar5_au:279: bhūyo bhūyaś cânubadhyamānā duḥkhena kathaṃ katham apy ācacakṣire deva pāvakaṃ praviṣṭa iti.
GK19bahcar5_au:280: tac ca śrutvā pluṣṭa ivântas-tāpena sadyo vivarṇatām agāt.
GK19bahcar5_au:281: utpāṭyamānam iva ca na śaśāka śokândhaṃ dhārayituṃ hṛdayam.
GK19bahcar5_au:282: āsīc câsya cetasi kāmaṃ svayaṃ na bhavati na tu śrāvayaty a-priyaṃ vacanam
GK19bahcar5_au:284: kṛcchre ca yathânenânuṣṭhitam ujjvalī-kṛtam adhikataraṃ jvalana-praveśena
GK19bahcar5_au:287: kim asya tāto na tātaḥ kiṃ vâmbā na jananī vayaṃ na bhrātaraḥ.
GK19bahcar5_au:288: anyasminn api tāvat svāmini durlabhī-bhavati bhavanty asavo dhriyamāṇā
GK19bahcar5_au:292: kiṃ vâsyâkalpam avasthitasya stheyaso yaśo-mayasya dahyate.
GK19bahcar5_au:296: a-puṇya-bhāk tv idam eva rāja-kulaṃ kula-putreṇa yat tādṛśā viyuktam.
GK19bahcar5_au:297: api ca mamâpi kaḥ khalv eteṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ kāryâtibhāraḥ kṛtya-śeṣo vā kā vā
GK19bahcar5_au:298: vyāpṛtatā yena nâdyâpi niṣṭhurāḥ prāṇāḥ pratiṣṭhante.
GK19bahcar5_au:299: ko vântarāyo hṛdayasya yena sahasradhā na dalatîti.
GK19bahcar5_au:303: itthaṃ-bhūte ca deve harṣe rājani ca tad-avasthe sarvasyaiva lokasya kapoleṣu kīlitā iva karā locaneṣu lepya-mayya ivâśru-srutayo nāsâgreṣu grathitā iva dṛṣṭayaḥ karṇeṣûtkīrṇā iva rudita-dhvanayo jihvāsu
GK19bahcar5_au:304: saha-jānîva hā kaṣṭāni lapaneṣu pallavitānîva śvasitāni adhareṣu likhitānîva paridevita-padāni hṛdayeṣu nidhānī-kṛtānîva duḥkhāny abhavan.
GK19bahcar5_au:307: nir-avaśeṣa-dagdhêva ca saṃtāpena na pravartata vāṇī.
GK19bahcar5_au:319: śanaiḥ śanaiś ca mahā-puruṣa-vinipāta-piśunāḥ samaṃ samantāt samudabhavan
GK19bahcar5_au:320: bhuvane bhūyāṃso bhū-pater abhāvāya bhayam utpādayanto bhūtānāṃ
GK19bahcar5_au:322: tathā hi dolāyamāna-sakala-kulâcala-cakravālā patyā sārdhaṃ gantu-kāmêva
GK19bahcar5_au:345: vi-rasa-virāviṇīnām unmukhīnāṃ śikhino jvālāḥ pratīcchantya iva patantīr
GK19bahcar5_au:351: aṭatām antaḥpurasyôpari kṣaṇam api na śaśāma vyākrośī vāyasānām.
GK19bahcar5_au:354: māṇikyasya kūjaj-jarad-gṛdhro mahôtpāta-dūyamānaś ca katham api nināya
GK19bahcar5_au:358: viṣādasyâkula-caraṇa-calat-tulā-koṭi-kvaṇita-vācâlitābhir udgrīvābhiḥ kiṃ kim etad iti pṛcchyamānêva dūrād eva bhavana-haṃsībhiḥ
GK19bahcar5_au:361: paṭântenêva raktâṃśukasya mukham ācchādya prarudatī saṃtāpa-bala-vilīna-kanaka-valaya-rasa-dhārām iva vetra-latām utsṛjantī
GK19bahcar5_au:367: iva kara-kisalayaṃ dhunānā cakṣur-nirjhare śīryati snapayantîva
GK19bahcar5_au:370: divasam api dahantîva kva kumāraḥ kva kumāra iti prati-puruṣaṃ pṛcchantī Velêti nāmnā Yaśomatyāḥ
GK19bahcar5_au:372: galantībhiḥ siñcantîva śuṣyantaṃ daśana-dīdhiti-dhārābhir ādhūsaram adharam adho-mukhī vijñāpitavatī deva paritrāyasva paritrāyasva.
GK19bahcar5_au:373: jīvaty eva bhartari kim apy adhyavasitaṃ devyā iti.
GK19bahcar5_au:374: tatas tad aparam ākarṇya cyuta iva sattvena druta iva duḥkhena ācānta iva cintayā tulita iva tāpena aṅgī-kṛta ivâṅgenâpratipattir āsīt.
GK19bahcar5_au:375: āsīc câsya cetasi pratipanna-saṃjñasya bahuśo 'pi hṛdaye duḥkhâbhiṣaṅgo nipatann aśmanîva loha-prahāraḥ kaṭhine huta-bhujam utthāpayati na tu
GK19bahcar5_au:378: tatra ca martum udyatānāṃ rāja-mahiṣīṇām aśṛṇod durād eva tāta cūta cintayâtmānaṃ pravasati te jananī.
GK19bahcar5_au:384: vatse priyaṅgu-latike gāḍham āliṅga māṃ durlabhā bhavāmi te.
GK19bahcar5_au:385: bhadra bhavana-dvāra-sahakāraka dātavyo nivāpa-toyâñjalir apatyam asi.
GK19bahcar5_au:386: bhrātaḥ pañjara-śuka yathā na vismarasi māṃ kiṃ vyāharasi dūrī-bhūtâsmi te śārike svapne naḥ samāgamaḥ punar bhūyāt.
GK19bahcar5_au:387: mātar mārga-lagnaṃ kasya samarpayāmi gṛha-mayūrakam amba sutaval lālanīyam
GK19bahcar5_au:388: idaṃ haṃsa-mithunaṃ manda-puṇyayā mayā na saṃbhāvito 'sya
GK19bahcar5_au:391: gṛha-hariṇike samupanaya sauvidalla-vallabha-vallakīṃ pariṣvaje tāvad enām.
GK19bahcar5_au:395: ārye kātyāyanike kiṃ rodiṣi nītâsmi daivena.
GK19bahcar5_au:396: tāta kañcukin kiṃ mām a-lakṣaṇāṃ pradakṣiṇī-karoṣi.
GK19bahcar5_au:398: bhagini gṛhāṇa mām a-paścimāṃ kaṇṭhe kaṣṭaṃ na dṛṣṭā priya-sakhī
GK19bahcar5_au:403: sakhyaḥ kṣantavyāḥ praṇaya-kalahā ity evaṃ-prāyān ālāpān.
GK19bahcar5_au:404: dahyamāna-śravaṇaś ca taiḥ praviśann eva niryāntīṃ datta-sarva-svāpateyāṃ
GK19bahcar5_au:405: gṛhīta-maraṇa-prasādhanāṃ jānakīm iva jāta-vedasaṃ patyuḥ puraḥ pravekṣyantīṃ pratyagra-snānârdra-dehatayā śriyam iva bhagavatīṃ sadyaḥ samudrād utthitāṃ kusumbha-babhruṇī vāsasī divam iva tejasī sāṃdhye dadhānāṃ tāmbūla-digdha-rāgândhakārâdhara-prabhā-paṭa-pāṭalaṃ paṭṭâṃśukam iva vidhavā-maraṇa-cihnam aṅga-lagnam udvahantīṃ rakta-kaṇṭha-sūtreṇa
GK19bahcar5_au:407: tiryak-kuṭila-kuṇḍala-koṭi-kaṇṭakâkṛṣṭa-tantunā hāreṇa valitena sitâṃśuka-pāśenêva kaṇṭham utpīḍayantīṃ sarasa-kuṅkumâṅga-rāgatayā
GK19bahcar5_au:408: kavalitām iva didhakṣatā citârciṣmatā citânalârcana-kusumair iva
GK19bahcar5_au:410: gṛha-devatâmantraṇa-balim iva valayair vigaladbhiḥ pade pade vikirantīm
GK19bahcar5_au:414: bhramadbhir bhavana-haṃsaiḥ saṃnihita-prāṇa-samaṃ maraṇāya cittam iva
GK19bahcar5_au:417: pati-prāsa-yaṣṭim iṣṭām upagūhamānāṃ bandhor iva nija-cāritrasya
GK19bahcar5_au:418: dhavalasya nṛ-pāta-patrasya puro netrôdakam utsṛjantīṃ patyuḥ pāda-patana-samudvamad-abhyadhika-bāṣpâmbhaḥ-pravāha-pratiruddha-dṛśaḥ
GK19bahcar5_au:421: pañjara-siṃha-bṛṃhitair hriyamāṇa-hṛdayāṃ dhātryā bhartṛ-bhaktyā ca nijayā prasādhitāṃ mūrcchayā jaratyā ca saṃstutayā dhāryamāṇāṃ sakhyā pīḍayā ca
GK19bahcar5_au:423: gṛhīta-sarvâvayavena parītāṃ kula-putrôcchvasitaiś ca mahattarair adhiṣṭhitāṃ kañcukibhir duḥkhaiś câtivṛddhair anugatāṃ bhū-pāla-vallabhān
GK19bahcar5_au:424: kauleyakān api sāsram ālokayantīṃ sa-patnīnām api pādayoḥ patantīṃ
GK19bahcar5_au:425: citra-putrikām apy āmantrayamāṇāṃ gṛha-patatriṇām apy añjaliṃ purastād
GK19bahcar5_au:426: uparacayantīṃ paśūn apy āpṛcchyamānāṃ bhavana-pādapān api pariṣvajyamānāṃ mātaraṃ dadarśa.
GK19bahcar5_au:427: dūrād eva ca bāṣpāyamāṇa-dṛṣṭir abhyadhāt: amba tvam api māṃ manda-puṇyaṃ
GK19bahcar5_au:428: tyajasi prasīda nivartasva ity abhidadhāna eva ca sa-sneham iva
GK19bahcar5_au:430: devī tu Yaśomatī tathā tiṣṭhati pāpa-nihita-śirasi vi-manasi kanīyasi preyasi tanaye guruṇā giriṇêvôdvegâvegenâvaṣṭabhyamānā mūrcchândha-tamasaṃ
GK19bahcar5_au:437: punar-ukta-sphuraṇa-nibiḍita-nāsā-puṭā nimīlya nayane nayanâmbhaḥ-seka-plavena plāvayantī vimalau kapolau saṃcchādya
GK19bahcar5_au:441: prasava-divasād ārabhya sakalam aṅka-śāyinaḥ śaiśavam asya jñāti-gṛha-gata-hṛdayā amba tāta na paśyataṃ pāpāṃ para-loka-prasthitāṃ
GK19bahcar5_au:442: mām evam ati-duḥkhitām iti muhur muhur ākrandatī pitarau hā vatsa
GK19bahcar5_au:443: viśrānta-bhāga-dheyayā na dṛṣṭo 'si iti preṣṭhaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ tanayam
GK19bahcar5_au:444: a-saṃnihitaṃ krośantī a-nāthā jātā iti śvaśura-kula-vartinīṃ duhitaram anuśocantī niṣ-karuṇa kim aparāddhaṃ tavâmunā janena iti daivam
GK19bahcar5_au:445: upālabhamānā nâsti mat-samā sīmantinī duḥkha-bhāginī iti nindantī bahu-vidham ātmānaṃ muṣitâsmi kṛtânta nṛ-śaṃsa tvayā ity akāṇḍe kṛtântaṃ garhamāṇā mukta-kaṇṭham ati-ciraṃ prākṛta-pramadêva prārodīt.
GK19bahcar5_au:446: praśānte ca manyu-vege sa-sneham utthāpayām āsa sutam.
GK19bahcar5_au:447: hastena câsya praruditasya pakṣma-pālī-puñjyamānâśru-kaṇa-nivahāṃ drutām ivâdhikataraṃ kṣarantīṃ dṛṣṭim unmamārja.
GK19bahcar5_au:451: āpūryamāṇe pramṛjya bāṣpârdra-gaṇḍa-gṛhītāṃ ca śravaṇa-śikharam āropya
GK19bahcar5_au:452: śoka-lambām alaka-latām adhaḥ-srasta-vilola-bālikā-vyākulitāṃ ca samutsārya tiraścīṃ cikura-saṭām aśru-pravāha-pūritam ārdraṃ ca kiṃ-cic
GK19bahcar5_au:453: cyutam utkṣipya hastena stanôttarīyaṃ taraṅgitam iva nakhâṃśu-paṭalena
GK19bahcar5_au:455: payasā prakṣālya mukha-kamalaṃ kala-mūka-loka-vidhṛte vāsaḥ-śakale śucini samunmṛjjya pāṇī suta-vadana-vinihita-nibhṛta-nayana-yugalā ciraṃ sthitvā punaḥ punar āyataṃ niḥśvasyâvādīt: vatsa nâsti na priyo nir-guṇo vā parityāgârho vā.
GK19bahcar5_au:456: stanyenaiva saha tvayā pītaṃ me hṛdayam.
GK19bahcar5_au:457: asmiṃś ca samaye prabhūta-prabhu-prasādântaritā tvāṃ na paśyati dṛṣṭiḥ.
GK19bahcar5_au:458: api ca putraka puruṣântara-viloka-navya-saninī rājyôpakaraṇam a-karuṇā vā nâsmi lakṣmīḥ kṣamā
GK19bahcar5_au:459: kula-kalatram asmi cāritra-mātra-dhanā dharma-dhavale kule jātā.
GK19bahcar5_au:460: kiṃ vismṛto 'si māṃ samara-śata-śauṇḍasya puruṣa-prakāṇḍasya kesariṇa iva kesariṇīṃ gṛhiṇīm.
GK19bahcar5_au:461: vīra-jā vīra-jāyā vīra-jananī ca mā-dṛśī parākrama-kraya-krītā katham anyathā kuryāt.
GK19bahcar5_au:472: evaṃ kṛtârtha-sarvâvayavā kim aparam apekṣe kṣīṇa-puṇyā martum
GK19bahcar5_au:474: na ca śaknomi dagdhasya sva-bhartur ārya-putra-virahitā Ratir iva nir-arthakān pralāpān
GK19bahcar5_au:475: pituś ca te pāda-dhūlir iva prathamaṃ gagana-gamanam āvedayantī bahu-matā
GK19bahcar5_au:477: pratyagra-dṛṣṭa-dāruṇa-duḥkha-dagdhāyāś ca me kiṃ dhakṣyati dhūma-dhvajaḥ.
GK19bahcar5_au:478: maraṇāc ca me jīvitam evâsmin samaye sāhasam.
GK19bahcar5_au:480: Kailāsa-kalpe pravasati jīvêśvare jarat-tṛṇa-kaṇikā-laghīyasi jīvite lobha iti kva ghaṭate 'pi ca jīvantīm api māṃ
GK19bahcar5_au:483: duḥkha-dagdhānāṃ ca bhūtir a-maṅgalā câ-praśastā ca nir-upayogā ca
GK19bahcar5_au:485: vatsa viśvastānāṃ yaśasā sthātum icchāmi loke na vapuṣā.
GK19bahcar5_au:486: tad aham eva tvāṃ tāvat tāta prasādayāmi na punar manoratha-prātikūlyena
GK19bahcar5_au:489: sa tu sa-saṃbhramam apanīya caraṇa-yugalam avanamita-tanur
GK19bahcar5_au:491: dur-nivāratāṃ ca śucaḥ samavadhārya kula-yoṣid-ucitāṃ ca tām eva śreyasīṃ manyamānaḥ kriyāṃ kṛta-niścayāṃ ca tāṃ jñātvā tūṣṇīm adho-mukho 'bhavat.
GK19bahcar5_au:493: devy api Yaśomatī pariṣvajya samāghrāya ca śirasi nirgatya caraṇābhyām eva cântaḥpurāt paurâkranda-pratiśabda-nirbharābhir uparudhyamānêva digbhiḥ Sarasvatī-tīraṃ yayau.
GK19bahcar5_au:495: pravikasita-rakta-paṅkaja-puñjair ivârcayitvā bhagavantaṃ bhānumantam iva mūrtir aindavī citra-bhānuṃ
GK19bahcar5_au:496: itaro 'pi mātṛ-maraṇa-vihvalo bandhu-varga-parivṛtaḥ pituḥ pārśvaṃ prāyāt.
GK19bahcar5_au:501: antas-tāpān mukha-candram iva dravī-bhavantaṃ daśana-jyotsnā-jālam iva jalatām āpadyamānaṃ locana-lāvaṇyam iva vilīyamānaṃ mukha-sudhā-rasam iva syandamānam acchâccham aśru-srotasāṃ saṃtānaṃ mahā-megha-maya-vilocana iva varṣan nitaravad-vimuktârāvaś ciraṃ ruroda.
GK19bahcar5_au:506: mahā-sattvatā hi prathamam avalambanaṃ lokasya paścād rāja-vījitā.
GK19bahcar5_au:507: sattvavatāṃ câgraṇīḥ sarvâtiśayâśritaḥ kva bhavān kva vaiklavyaṃ
GK19bahcar5_au:508: kula-pradīpo 'si iti divasa-kara-sadṛśa-tejasas te laghū-karaṇam iva.
GK19bahcar5_au:510: kṣitir iyaṃ tava iti lakṣaṇâkhyāta-cakravarti-padasya punar-uktam iva.
GK19bahcar5_au:511: gṛhyatāṃ śrīr iti svayam eva śriyā parigṛhītasya viparītam iva.
GK19bahcar5_au:512: adhyāsyatām ayaṃ loka ity ubhaya-loka-vijigīṣor a-puṣkalam iva.
GK19bahcar5_au:514: ātmī-kriyatāṃ rājakam iti guṇa-gaṇâtmī-kṛta-jagato gatârtham iva.
GK19bahcar5_au:523: nir-avaśeṣatāṃ śatravo neyā iti sahajasya tejasa evêyaṃ cintā.
GK19bahcar5_au:524: ity evaṃ vadann evâ-punar-unmīlanāya nimimīla rāja-siṃho locane pratyapadyata ca pūṣâtmajaḥ.
GK19bahcar5_au:525: asminn evântare pūṣâpy āyuṣêva tejasā vyayujyata tataś ca lajjamāna iva
GK19bahcar5_au:528: mandaṃ mandam a-priya-praśnârtham iva laukikīṃ sthitim anuvartamāno
GK19bahcar5_au:530: ditsur iva janêśāya jalâñjalim apara-jala-nidhi-samīpam upasasarpa.
GK19bahcar5_au:535: samupôhyamāna-mahā-janâśru-durdinârdrī-kṛta iva nirvārtyâtape rodana-tāmra-sakala-loka-locana-rucêva lohitāyati jagati uṣṇāyamānâneka-nara-niḥśvāsa-saṃtāpa-pluṣṭa iva ca nīlāyamāne divase
GK19bahcar5_au:541: krameṇa ca lokântaram upagatavaty anurāga-śeṣe jāte tejasām adhīśe.
GK19bahcar5_au:542: gagana-tala-vitanyamāna-bahala-rāga-pāṭalāyāṃ preta-patākāyām iva pravṛttāyāṃ saṃdhyāyāṃ śava-śibikâlaṃkāra-kṛṣṇa-cāmara-mālāsv iva sphurantīṣu darśana-pratikūlāsu timira-lekhāsu asitâguru-kāla-kāṣṭhāyāṃ
GK19bahcar5_au:543: kenâpi citāyām iva racitāyāṃ rajanyāṃ dantâmala-patra-prasādhita-karṇikāsu
GK19bahcar5_au:546: nāka-patha-prasthita-pārthiva-pratyudgata-puru-hūtâtapatra iva pūrvasyāṃ diśi dṛśyamāne candramasi narêndraḥ svayaṃ samarpita-skandhair gṛhītvā
GK19bahcar5_au:547: śava-śibikāṃ Śibi-samaḥ sāmantaiḥ pauraiś ca purohita-puraḥsaraiḥ saritaṃ Sarasvatīṃ nītvā nara-pati-samucitāyāṃ citāyāṃ hutâśa-satkriyayā
GK19bahcar5_au:549: devo 'pi Harṣaḥ puñjī-bhūtena sakalenêva jīva-lokena lokena
GK19bahcar5_au:551: śokânala-taptena sneha-draveṇa bahir iva sicyamāno nirvyavadhānāyāṃ dharaṇyām upaviṣṭa eva tāṃ niśīthinīṃ Bhīmarathī-bhīmām akhilāṃ sa-rājako
GK19bahcar5_au:553: ajani câsya cetasi tāte dūrī-bhūte saṃpraty etāvān khalu jīva-loko lokasya bhagnāḥ panthāno manorathānāṃ khilī-bhūtāni bhūti-sthānāni sthagitāny ānandasya dvārāṇi suptā satya-vāditā luptā loka-yātrā vilīnā bāhu-śālitā
GK19bahcar5_au:557: kathâvaśeṣā viśeṣa-jñatā dadātu jano jalâñjalim aurjityāya pratipadyatāṃ pravrajyāṃ prajā-pālatā badhnātu vaidhavya-veṇīṃ vara-manuṣyatā
GK19bahcar5_au:558: samāśrayatu rāja-śrīr āśrama-padaṃ paridhattāṃ dhavale vāsasī vasumatī vahatu valkale vilāsitā tapasyatu tapo-vaneṣu tejasvitā prāvṛṇotu cīvare
GK19bahcar5_au:559: vīratā kva gamyatāṃ punas tasya kṛte kṛta-jñatayā kva punaḥ prāpsyati
GK19bahcar5_au:560: tādṛśān mahā-puruṣa-nirmāṇa-paramâṇūn paramêṣṭhī śūnyāḥ saṃvṛttā daśa diśo guṇānāṃ jagaj jātam andhakāraṃ dharmasya niṣ-phalam adhunā janma śastrôpajīvinām.
GK19bahcar5_au:561: tātena vinā kutas tyās tādṛśyo divasam
GK19bahcar5_au:564: api nāma svapne 'pi dṛśyeta dīrgha-rakta-nayanaṃ punas tan-mukha-sarojaṃ
GK19bahcar5_au:567: lokântare 'pi putrêty ālapataḥ punaḥ punaḥ śrūyeta sā sudhā-rasam
GK19bahcar5_au:569: etāni cânyāni ca cintayata evâsya katham api sā kṣayam iyāya yāminī.
GK19bahcar5_au:575: pravrajyām iva pratipanne nabhasi prabhāta-samayena samuttīryamāṇāsu
GK19bahcar5_au:584: rājatîva deve divam ārūḍhe savitari parivṛtte rājya iva rajanī-prabandhe
GK19bahcar5_au:585: prabuddha-rāja-haṃsa-maṇḍala-prabodhyamānaḥ paṅkajâkara iva cacāla snānāya devo Harṣaḥ.
GK19bahcar5_au:596: niḥśvāsa-paro nir-ātapatro nir-utsāraṇaḥ samupanīte 'pi saptau caraṇābhyām eva nāsâgrâsaktena rakta-tāmarasa-tāmreṇa cakṣuṣā hṛdayâvaśeṣasyâpi pitur
GK19bahcar5_au:597: dāha-śaṅkayā śokâgnim iva udgirann a-tāmbūlasyâpi sucira-prakṣālitasya
GK19bahcar5_au:600: iva hṛdayâbhighātād udvamann uṣṇa-niḥśvāsa-mokṣair bhavanam ājagāma.
GK19bahcar5_au:601: rāja-vallabhās tu bhṛtyāḥ suhṛdaḥ sacivāś ca tasminn evâhani nirgatya priyaṃ putra-dāram utsṛjyôdbāṣpair bandhubhir vāryamāṇā api
GK19bahcar5_au:602: bahu-nṛpa-guṇa-gaṇa-hṛta-hṛdayāḥ ke-cid ātmānaṃ bhṛguṣu babandhuḥ ke-cit
GK19bahcar5_au:603: tatraiva tīrtheṣu tasthuḥ ke-cid anaśanair āstīrṇa-tṛṇa-kuśā
GK19bahcar5_au:604: vyathamāna-mānasāḥ śucam asamām aśamayan ke-cic chalabhā iva vaiśvānaraṃ
GK19bahcar5_au:606: gṛhīta-vācas tuṣāra-śikhariṇaṃ śaraṇam upāyayuḥ ke-cid vindhyôpatyakāsu
GK19bahcar5_au:608: saṃtāpam aśamayan ke-cit saṃnihitān api viṣayān utsṛjya sevā-vimukhāḥ
GK19bahcar5_au:609: paricchinnaiḥ piṇḍakair aṭavī-bhuvaḥ śūnyā jagṛhuḥ ke-cit pavanâśanā
GK19bahcar5_au:610: dharma-dhanā dhamad-dhamanayo munayo babhūvuḥ ke-cid gṛhīta-kāṣāyāḥ
GK19bahcar5_au:611: kāpilaṃ matam adhijagire giriṣu ke-cid ācoṭita-cūḍā-maṇiṣu śiraḥsu
GK19bahcar5_au:617: kamaṇḍalubhiś ca vāri vahanto gṛhīta-vratā muṇḍā viceruḥ.
GK19bahcar5_au:618: devam api Harṣaṃ tad-avasthaṃ pitṛ-śoka-vihvalī-kṛtaṃ śriyaṃ śāpa iti
GK19bahcar5_au:619: mahīṃ mahā-pātakam iti rājyaṃ roga iti bhogān bhuj-aṅgā iti nilayaṃ niraya
GK19bahcar5_au:620: iti bandhuṃ bandhanam iti jīvitam a-yaśa iti dehaṃ droha iti kalyatāṃ kalaṅka iti āyur a-puṇya-phalam iti āhāraṃ viṣam iti viṣam a-mṛtam iti candanaṃ dahana iti kāmaṃ krakaca iti hṛdaya-sphoṭanam abhyudaya iti ca
GK19bahcar5_au:622: ciraṃ-tanāḥ kula-putrāḥ vaṃśa-kramâhita-gauravāś ca grāhya-giro guravaḥ
GK19bahcar5_au:624: mūrdhâbhiṣiktāś câmātyā rājāno yathāvad-adhigatâtma-tattvāś ca saṃstutā maskariṇaḥ sama-duḥkha-sukhāś ca munayaḥ saṃsārâsāratva-kathana-kuśalā
GK19bahcar5_au:626: a-svatantrī-kṛtaś ca tair manasâpi nâlabhata śokânupravaṇam ācaritum.
GK19bahcar5_au:627: pracura-mitrânunīyamānaś ca sanābhibhiḥ kathaṃ katham apy āhārâdikāsu
GK19bahcar5_au:629: bhrātṛ-gata-hṛdayaś câcintayat: api nāma tātasya maraṇaṃ
GK19bahcar5_au:630: mahā-pralaya-sadṛśam idam upaśrutya āryo bāṣpa-jala-snāto na gṛhṇīyād valkale.
GK19bahcar5_au:636: a-nityatayā janita-vairāgyo vā na nirākuryād upasarpantīṃ rājya-lakṣmīm.
GK19bahcar5_au:638: ihâgato vā rājabhir abhidhīyamāno na parācīnatām ācared iti.
GK19bahcar5_au:640: sarvadā tāta-ślāghayā mām abhidhatte tāta Harṣa kasya-cid abhūd bhaviṣyati vā punaḥ kāñcana-tāla-taru-prāṃśu kāya-pramāṇam idam īdṛk ca
GK19bahcar5_au:643: ete ca hasita-madâlasa-Haladhara-vibhramā vilāsāḥ ko 'nyo mānī vikrānto vadānyo vā iti.
GK19bahcar5_au:644: etāni cânyāni ca cintayan darśanôtsuka-hṛdayo bhrātur āgamanam udīkṣamāṇaḥ
